data.text:
Admissions Officer

07935570632 Ruth Blake (Available Friday 9:00am to 1:00pm Term Time Only)

PARKING

Parking is available in the lay-by outside Westfield School or the car park at the end of Chester Road.

TRAIN

Bedford train station is situated on Ashburnham Road, a short distance from PLACE. Go along Ford End Road towards Chester Road.

ACCESSIBILITY

Access to the PLACE centre is via the main gate of Westfield School. Please press the buzzer on the gate and then go diagonally right across the car park. Our building is on the right and is wheelchair accessible.
